description:
When protest leader Sadie Santana becomes a problem for a leading candidate, the campaign dispatches The Fixer. Tommy Pistol handles the the problem with his usual aplomb and toolbox of hardcore BDSM Action and Rough Anal Sex!
Hooded and masked hottie Sadie Santana is a strong willed protester with an attitude! Tommy chips away at her searing will with heavy humiliation, gags, whips, bondage, sexual interrogation and straight up hardcore sexual domination.
title: The Subversive
